response.overview: What if you were one of the strongest climber in the world  And you spent 5 years trying one of the hardest boulder problems you have ever done  In your bedroom  Then you did this boulder problem  But nobody would ever know  And nobody would ever try it  And you didnâ€™t care  Welcome to Splinter.  Climber: Malcolm Smith Credits: Ben Pritchard & Richard Heap
response.title: Splinter
